description:
Whether you kissed a rock on high speed descent or are upgrading your drivetrain, this rear derailleur will help you pedal up and power down. Outfitted with microSHIFT’s ratchet style clutch and big, tall-toothed pulleys, the Advent X keeps your shifts crisp and you chain right where it should be.

  • Only compatible with microSHIFT Advent X drivetrains
  • Works with most 10-speed chains
  • Ratchet and pawl clutch can be adjusted with a switch
  • Large pulleys with tall teeth improve chain retention
  • Lightweight aluminum cage
name: Microshift Advent X Rear Derailleur 10 Speed
